channel.title: BritPod - MP3 Version
channel.itunes:author: BritPod
channel.description: BritPod provides a unique look at the world through the eyes of 3 Brits, a Texan and a Canuck.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Whatever it is, it's very rude
channel.itunes:summary: BritPod provides a unique look at the world through the eyes of 3 Brits, a Texan and a Canuck... we even have celebrities sometimes! BritPod is an enhanced Podcast, for the enhanced version, goto http://britpod.com/podcast/BritPod.xml
